1.text: The elder to the elect lady, and her children, whom I love in the truth; and not I only, but also all they that have known the truth;

2.text: For the truthâ€™s sake which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.

3.text: Grace be with you, mercy, and peace from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

4.text: I rejoiced greatly, that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.

5.text: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment to thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

6.text: And this is love, that we walk according to his commandments. This is the commandment, that as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.

7.text: For many deceivers have entered into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver, and an antichrist.

8.text: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.

9.text: Whoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.

10.text: If any one cometh to you, and bringeth not this doctrine, receive him not into your house, neither wish him happiness:

11.text: For he that wisheth him happiness, is partaker of his evil deeds.

12.text: Having many things to write to you, I would not write with paper and ink: but I trust to come to you, and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.

13.text: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.
